error: Could not find requires class (Missing dependency or mismatched version)
solution: A plugin (Plugin: %0 - Class: %1) was unable to access code it requires because it is missing. Make sure the plugin you are using supports the Minecraft version/software you are using and that it has any dependencies it requires installed. Some plugins have a "Legacy" version for old verisons of Minecraft, if you are running a modern version make sure it is not a Legacy version of the plugin.
